meanings.definition: To come together in a group or crowd.
meanings.sent1: The students congregates in the schoolyard during recess.
meanings.sent2: The birds congregates on the power lines every evening.
meanings.sent3: The toys congregates in the toy box, having a party when no one is looking.
meanings.sent4: The stars congregates in the night sky, forming beautiful constellations.
meanings.sent5: The ants congregates around the sugar cube, creating a busy scene.

meanings.definition: To gather or assemble in one place.
meanings.sent1: The family congregates around the dinner table every evening.
meanings.sent2: The protesters congregates in the town square to voice their concerns.
meanings.sent3: The clouds congregates in the sky, discussing the upcoming rain showers.
meanings.sent4: The thoughts congregates in his mind, creating a jumble of ideas.
meanings.sent5: The ingredients congregates in the mixing bowl, ready to be turned into a delicious cake.
